paragraph.paragraph: The Precompiled property page in the Common Properties folder contains the following properties:

Precompiled Library
The path to a EiffelEnvision precompiled project folder containing the precomp.epr Eiffel compiler project file. Warning: Changing this property requires a complete rebuild and will be enforced when selecting to ../../../compiling_projects/compiling_projects.xmlbuilding_projectsBuild your project.
If you do not want to manually specify the path to a precomp.epr, EiffelEnvision provides four selectable alternative options for this property:
EiffelBase: The EiffelBase precompiled library.
Windows Eiffel Library: The Windows Eiffel Library (WEL) precompiled library.
EiffelVision 2: The EiffelVision 2 precompiled library.
Browse...: Locate a precomp.epr via a file browse dialog.

Use Optimized Precompile
Use an optimized version of the Precompiled Library assembly if there is one available. The optimized version will only be taken when the build.xmloptimize_codeOptimized Code property from the build.xmlBuild property page is set to Yes. Warning: Changing this property requires a complete rebuild and will be enforced when selecting to ../../../compiling_projects/compiling_projects.xmlbuilding_projectsBuild your project.
